Our 2-in-1 Dog Shampoo & Conditioner is a dog deodorizer featuring green tea and bergamot botanical extracts. Whether you're looking for a dog shampoo to promote a beautiful coat or just a dog shampoo for smelly dogs — we've got you covered. This hydrating formula includes aloe vera, coconut, bergamot, green tea, chamomile, tea trea oil and sage. Smells as good as it sounds! Immediately soothes dog's skin and leaves a lustrous, velvety soft coat. Buddy Wash is soap-free and alcohol-free, safe for you and your canine companion. – Gentle & safe – Combination dog shampoo & dog conditioner makes dog grooming fast and easy – Coconut based with green tea and botanical extracts of sagere gentle on dog's skin and smell amazing (not perfumey) – Made in the USA with natural herbs and oils – Soap-free and alcohol-free Ingredients Coconut shampoo base, aloe vera gel, essence of green tea, essence of bergamot, chamomile extract, sage extract, nettle extract, rosemary extract, wheat protein extract (natural deodorizing agent), tea tree oil, vitamin E, vitamin C. About Buddy Wash Buddy Wash began when a couple of pet lovers couldn't find wholesome grooming products for their pets' unique needs, so they decided to make them themselves. They developed refreshing spritzers and nourishing shampoos and conditioners using simple ingredients and no harsh chemicals. Every product is safe for humans and pets, made in the USA and never tested on animals. Try our other grooming products: Buddy Wash: shampoo & conditioner to nourish skin and make coats velvety soft Buddy Rinse: leave in conditioner, added after bath to moisturize and fresh scent Buddy Splash: deodorizer & conditioner to refresh your dog's coat with lasting scent
